Title: The Butter Shave
Plot: Not fully recovered from "The Summer of George," George is using a cane to get around. Jerry might have another shot at NBC, through an appearance on a NBC Showcase that might lead to another pilot. He is also annoyed that lame comic Kenny Bania's act is working, only because he is following on Jerry's coattails, a time-slot hit. Bania scores with big laughs and also gets one of Jerry's ex-girlfriends. George gets a job interview. Elaine is on vacation for a month in Europe with David Puddy. If
Writer: Alec Berg, Jeff Schaffer, David Mandel
GuestStars: Wayne Knight, Steve Hytner, Patrick Warburton, Kristin Davis, Gordon Jump, Everett Greenbaum, Connie Sawyer, Matthew Fonda, Chris Parnell, Frank Van Keeken, Shannon Whirry, Nancy Balbirer, Erica Y. Becoat, Torste
